description: Dispatched when closeness relationships are established between actors sitting adjacently on furniture.

actorId.description: The ID of the actor who sat down and triggered closeness establishment.

furnitureId.description: The ID of the furniture entity where the actors are seated.

adjacentActors.description: Array of actor IDs who are sitting adjacently and now have closeness established.

operationId.description: Unique identifier for this operation instance.
